title: How to Get Into the 7th Gym in Pokémon SoulSilver (Kanto)

steps.title: Walk or bike to Mahogany Town.
steps.content: Walk or bike to Mahogany Town.

steps.title: Go into the house next to a tree with antennas on it.
steps.content: Go into the house next to a tree with antennas on it.

steps.title: Go in and talk to the guy at the back.
steps.content: Go in and talk to the guy at the back. He will sell things to you.

steps.title: Go to Route 43 (north) and you will battle some trainers.
steps.content: Go to Route 43 (north) and you will battle some trainers. You will see your rival and will have to battle him.

steps.title: After the battle, surf on the lake, and you will see a red Gyarados.
steps.content: After the battle, surf on the lake, and you will see a red Gyarados. Press A and you can battle it to catch it if you want. If you choose to battle, watch out for its Bite and Dragon Rage. They are very powerful moves.

steps.title: After you beat it (or catch it), a guy named Lance will come.
steps.content: After you beat it (or catch it), a guy named Lance will come. He will say something and go away. Go back to town, and go into the house mentioned before. You will see Lance in there.

steps.title: Go down the stairs.
steps.content: Go down the stairs. You will need to beat all of the Team Rocket grunts and the Team Rocket Boss (Giovanni).

steps.title: After you beat them, heal your Pokémon, and get to the gym!
steps.content: After you beat them, heal your Pokémon, and get to the gym! The Gym Leader will be Pryce, who uses Ice Pokémon.
